sentences.en: Doubtless he was justified in some of his criticism of the media.
sentences.cn: 他对媒体的一些批评性言论无疑是合乎情理的。

sentences.en: Doubtless there was a certain struggle and a certain relief.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问,有过一番思想斗争,后来也如释重负.

sentences.en: Doubtless there would be lots of rumours.
He will doubtless seek other means of satiating his dark passion. "
sentences.cn: 他肯定会谋求另外的手段来满足他那不可告人的感情. ”

sentences.en: He will doubtless try and persuade his colleagues to change their minds.
sentences.cn: 他很可能会试图说服同事们改变主意。

sentences.en: He would doubtless disapprove of what Kelly was doing.
sentences.cn: 他不会赞同凯利做的事。

sentences.en: He'd doubtless heard rumours on the grapevine.
sentences.cn: 他无疑是听到了小道消息。

sentences.en: His direct, often abrasive approach will doubtless ruffle a few feathers.
sentences.cn: 他那直截了当、往往还粗鲁生硬的办事方式无疑会激怒一些人。

sentences.en: It was doubtless his own fault.
It will doubtless rain on the day of the garden party.
sentences.cn: 游园会那天很可能会下雨.

sentences.en: Now those who die for others doubtless attain this result.
sentences.cn: 现在那些为他人而献身的人无疑会得到这一结果.

sentences.en: She is doubtless my best friend.
sentences.cn: 她无疑是我最好的朋友.

sentences.en: She took off her shoes, doubtless because her feet hurt.
sentences.cn: 她脱掉了鞋子，大概是因为脚疼。

sentences.en: The conviction doubtless showed in the cloud on her brow.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问,这信念表现在她紧锁的眉尖上.

sentences.en: They were, doubtless, good men, just and sage.
sentences.cn: 不消说, 他们都是为人圣洁 、 主持正义的好人.

sentences.en: This manuscript will doubtless afford you the greatest pleasure.
sentences.cn: 这份手稿无疑会给你带来极大的乐趣.

words.tran_cn: 可疑的；令人生疑的；疑心的；不能确定的
抱怀疑态度的人；不信宗教的人；怀疑论者

trans.tran_en: used when saying that something is almost certain to happen or be true
